Articles.Content: I am trying to figure out how to make the info boxes onscreen smaller. I use Mechjeb and the info boxes are covering my screen...any help is very appreciated.
I'm not sure it's possible, but I'd recommend asking in the Add-ons section for someone who knows more about it then me. In all my experiences, though, I'm not sure they can shrink.
If your graphics card can handle it you could try to use a higher screen resolution. In pixels the windows won't get smaller but they will relative to you screen.
Higher Rez did the trick. Thank you for your help
MechJeb also has the option of using a more compact skin - this is available in one of the settings.
